Hello!
The name's

/ə-ljɛz-əh/

  1. UX Professional
  2. I love MAPS
  3. Coffee Junkie
  4. Frustrated Surfer
  5. Dragonmother
  6. Based in Makati

Working with big ol’ companies and startups, I have accumulated years of experience in UX design and strategy, UI design, visual design and front-end development.

An eternally curious soul and passionate problem solver, you can often find me gleefully solutioneering with a rainbow of pens, markers, post-its and my favorite Rocketpad. 

When I’m not designing, you would find me behind my gaming PC, writing with my latest thoughts on my blog, playing football or reading books upside down.
